title: Peter Andre says having kids with Katie Price was best thing from I’m a Celeb
text:
Katie and Peter had a whirlwind romance on I’m a Celebrity (Picture: Rex Features, Backgrid)

Peter Andre is incredibly proud of the fact that he and Katie Price are the only contestants from I’m a Celebrity to go on to have children together.

Back in 2004, Peter, 46, met and fell in love with Katie, 41, during the third series of the hit ITV show. The pair went on to marry before having children Junior, 14, and Princess, 12, before divorcing in 2009.

While his relationship with Katie has been strained since their split, Peter is proud that their kids came from their whirlwind romance on the series.

Good Morning Britain host Kate Garraway is rumoured to have signed up for this year’s series and while she’s refused to confirm her place on the line-up, she asked Peter on Wednesday: ‘Is it a good thing [going on the show]?’

Peter replied: ‘Yeah it is.

‘It did change my life, do you know my two children, my two eldest are the only ever to come from that show?’

Kate cheekily replied: ‘So far,’ to which a shocked Peter asked: ‘What are you saying?’

Still trying to deflect from the line-up rumours, Kate stated: ‘I can neither confirm or deny.’

It sounds like Kate is predicting some hanky panky in this year’s series…

Peter shares Junior and Princess with Katie (Picture: Instagram)

The 52-year-old has been forced to dodge the I’m a Celebrity rumours all week. On Tuesday, fill-in entertainment reporter Peter couldn’t help but put Kate on the spot about the reports.

Offering Kate some advice based on his past experience on the show, Peter said: ‘Listen, let me really talk you through if you decide to do it, or if you are already doing this.’

But Kate refused to play ball and replied: ‘I don’t know, I’m a journalist, I’m paid to ask questions about all sorts of things. I’ve got a little flustered again.’

Good Morning Britain continues weekdays on ITV at 6am.
